As part of the [Vanderbilt Epithelial Biology Center](https://www.vumc.org/ebc/overview), the Coffey Lab studies EGFR and it ligands in regulation of epithelial cell growth and differentiation, gastrointestinal neoplasias, GI stem cells, and extracellular vesicles.
